Name: Christmas Mansion
About the game: Elf is back! Complete his quests and restore Winterland before holidays. Build a cozy little cottage on the hill and a cookie factory, fire up the oven and get baking! Think you could whip up a nice batch of muffins? Build an ornament factory, ski workshop and complete dozens of other quests to prepare a fantastic holiday party. Winter has tons of fun in stock for you. Create the Gingerbread decoration telling the tale of Hansel and Gretel! Clean the scene first! Start building! Build the witch's castle! Blast through the puzzles and have a fantastic Christmas holiday again! • Dozens of quests to complete in three chapters. • Hundreds of matching levels with new obstacles • Fantastic winter soundtrack
